Author: livipup
Text: I think if you focus on getting all of your nutrients it might help, but your body does have a minimum calorie requirement for proper function. It's easy to imagine that your body is expecting you to eat more and expecting more carbs to burn through. Idk I'm not a professional and have been drinking, but I feel like that's a thing
